name: places/ChIJkzxFc4hZwokRoNVRLPGrvOc
formattedAddress: 231 Grand St, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 231 Grand St, New York, NY 10013, USA

editorialSummary.text: Laid-back lodging offering free Wi-Fi & breakfast, plus a fitness room with city views.

originalText.text:
This hotel was amazing! I came to New York for a 1 day get away from a very busy life style. When I arrived I was very impressed with the customer service Shane provided. We arrived to New York early and wanted to check to check in early. Luckily when we arrived at 130pm, we were able to check in. The staff practiced tcustomer service. The room was clean, while in NYC. My favorite amenities they offer are the complimentary breakfast!
Breakfast was about the best that I have ever tasted. Secondly the shower was so relaxing and third, to top it off, the heated shower floors! I recommend this hotel to everyone.

text.text:

Breakfast was about the best that I have ever tasted. Secondly the shower was so relaxing and third, to top it off, the heated shower floors! I recommend this hotel to everyone.

originalText.text:
Centrally located in Chinatown, right next to the subway and just a few steps away from little Italy and Soho and countless top restaurants.
The staff was nice and helpful, the room was large and with a big bathroom and a comfortable bed. Everything was clean but it smelled a little musty.
Breakfast was a bit simple, but competent.
Beware that check-in isn't allowed until 4PM.
All in all, I recommend to anyone travelling on a budget that still wants to stay in Manhattan.

originalText.text: The breakfast was great! I was really impressed with the many options and that they had soy milk for us vegans. Everything was mega clean and even the fellow guests were wonderful and friendly. I adored this gem of a hotel with exceptional service, surprisingly upscale rooms with a cozy bed and super hot shower which I Love!

text.text: The breakfast was great! I was really impressed with the many options and that they had soy milk for us vegans. Everything was mega clean and even the fellow guests were wonderful and friendly. I adored this gem of a hotel with exceptional service, surprisingly upscale rooms with a cozy bed and super hot shower which I Love!

originalText.text:
The hotel, breakfast, and staff were all really great. The room clean and comfortable. We were greeted every time we passed the front desk and offered assistance with directions and the subway system upon arrival. The breakfast was fairly good too! At one point, they had run out of eggs, and made a fresh omelet for us. They have a variety of food and drink options.
The only downfall (which has nothing to do with the hotel itself) was the noise level from the streets below. I found it quite loud and difficult to sleep at times.
Overall a great experience.

text.text:

Overall a great experience.

originalText.text: This was the perfect hotel for our family's trip to NYC for Spring Break.  It offered a good and broad breakfast.  The room was clean and the bathroom was updated.  It was also steps from one Subway stop, and just a few blocks from two others.  The room was bigger than expected and had queen sized beds.  The staff was friendly and knowledgeable.  I would stay here with my family again.
